summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Area Partnership to End and Prevent Homelessness Local Government Corporation (DAP) and the Citizen Homelessness Commission (CHC) will hold a joint meeting on February 1, 2024, from 12:00 PM to 12:30 PM at Dallas City Hall. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss key recommendations and strategies related to homelessness in Dallas.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order and Roll Call  
2. Public Comment Session  
3. Discussion on the Hope Report Recommendation to eliminate duplicative oversight committees.

**Important Details**:  
The primary focus of the meeting will be on the Hope Report, which suggests streamlining oversight by removing overlapping committees. This proposal aims to enhance the efficiency of homelessness prevention efforts and improve coordination among existing services.

**Action Items**:  
The meeting seeks to gather public input during the comment session and will discuss the potential approval of the recommendation to eliminate duplicative oversight committees. Decisions made during this meeting will influence future policies and operational structures related to homelessness in Dallas. 

Public participation is encouraged, and those wishing to speak must register in advance.
